name: TrueSight Pulse Http Check Plugin
description: Polls a set of URLs and reports back the response time

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The source to display in the legend for the endpoint. Ex. www.google.com

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval (sec)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: The Poll Interval (in seconds) to call your endpoint. Ex. 5

paramSchema.title: URL
paramSchema.name: url
paramSchema.description: The URL of the endpoint.  For example, www.graphdat.com or www.graphdat.com:8080/some-random-page

paramSchema.title: Ignore Status Code
paramSchema.name: ignoreStatusCode
paramSchema.description: If any response from the server is considered valid, even an error, enable this.

paramSchema.title: Username
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.description: (optional) The username required to access the endpoint

paramSchema.title: Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: (optional) The password required to access the endpoint

paramSchema.title: POST data
paramSchema.name: postdata
paramSchema.description: (optional) Additional information to pass along to the endpoint. Key Values pairs, "key=value" one per line

paramSchema.title: Debug Level
paramSchema.name: debug_level
paramSchema.description: If you are having issues with the plugin, you can enable additional debugging output to be shown in the relay console
